desert.name: REGAL VELVET CHEESE CAKE
desert.description: A sumptuous crimson cheesecake with a delicate red velvet crumbs plated on glaze swoosh, garnished with gold leaf and dusted with edible red powder.

desert.name: GLIDED CHURROS WITH CHOCOLATE FONDANT
desert.description: Plated on a bed of splattered dark chocolate glaze, cinnamon sugar and an array of micro veggies with a scoop of caramel flavored ice cream.

desert.name: THE MAYFAIR ECLAIRS
desert.description: A plate of white and dark chocolate glazed garnished with gold leaves and chocolate chips.

desert.name: WARM CHOCOLATE FONDANT
desert.description: A warm fondant chocolate plated on a dust of chocolate powder topped with ice cream and mint leave.

desert.name: TROPICAL JEWEL
desert.description: A dessert pineapple creme brûlée served in a pineapple with caramelized sugar and dollops of ice cream and micro veggies.

desert.name: CRÈME CITRUS
desert.description: A-slice of a creamy vanilla and lemon zest cake garnished with lemon curds, mint leaves lemon zest and citrus peel.
